thread.section_title: Buddha-Bar Hotel Paris - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Perfect in every way
thread.title_full: Perfect in every way - Review of Buddha-Bar Hotel Paris, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: TairaDXB
title: Perfect in every way
text:
I had the pleasure of staying for one night in this fabulous hotel! From start to finish the service was immaculate, the staff were super friendly and attentive, The location was idea. In the evening we had a meal in the Buddha bar restaurant and enjoyed every mouth full of our meal.
The decor was taste full and element.
Look forward to returning again.
